answers.answer: Hi there! Congrads :)Im due April 30th, never had morning sickness , im just really sleepy and no problem with my apetite :)Husband and I are excpecting a boy, and im ftm :)About three more months, so crazy, time flies by :)
My middle daughter was born on the 30th of April... I'm never lost my appetite and never did to much vomiting, mostly nausea that's all...
This is my second my son is six now and my little girl is due april 19 but unlike you my sons was easy no issue and she has given me a run for my money every step of the way....cant wait til april...
My 1st was a girl & easy pregnancy easy labor. I'm due April 20th with my 2nd & this pregnancy has been the exact opposite. I have had every possible pregnancy symptom under the sun.

Aww congrats u give me hope I have 2 boys and what a girl so so so bad...everyone keeps saying its going to be a boy cause that's the pattern.... I really really hope this is a girl...I know this time I was a sick as I was with my boys and I actually gained a lil weight in my 1st trimester.. With my boys I lost a lot...my period puts my due DAT at August 6 conception at 7th and ultrasound at 8th just like urs

This is my 3rd healthy pregnancy, I'm 30 weeks (due March 30th) with my first boy but it doesn't seem any different than my 2nd pregnancy. Actually I had gestational diabetes with both girls but didn't develop it with this little one so it is actually a little easier. However, I have had more discomfort in my hips but I figure its more related to this being my 3rd pregnancy more than the fact I'm having a boy.

question: I've finally been blessed with a boy after 3 lovely girls... But he has also given me a lot of drama... I'm due in April either the 6,7 or 8th:) I only say that cause according to my last minstrel it's the 6th, my conceived date led me to the 7th, and my ultra sound said the 8th... This is the first time I've ever felt pregnant... I've got morning sickness, fatigue, sensitive, can't breath, bigger than what i was completely with my girls etc.How has your pregnancy been???
title: Carrying my first boy and what a journey!!!
